message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the chance to purchase this product. I believe it holds significant value for you, and I'm confident it can be a game-changer for your operations.  To kick things off, I'm proposing a starting price of $1,400,000.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,200,000. I believe that's a more reasonable price considering the product's value to me.

Bob, I understand your perspective on the value. However, my original offer reflects the true worth and potential this product offers.  To find a middle ground, I'm willing to adjust my price to $1,325,000.  This offer represents a significant investment from my end while still acknowledging the value it brings to your table.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I still think $1,200,000 is a fair price. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer $1,300,000. I believe this price reflects the value the product will bring to my operations.
